title: KP CM calls on PM, discuss provincial matters, political situation
content:
ISLAMABAD, April 13 (APP): Chief Minister Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Mahmood Khan Tuesday called upon Prime Minister Imran Khan to discuss provincial matters and the political situation.
During the meeting, Peshawar-Dera Ismail Khan Expressway project and availability of wheat in the province were also discussed.
